sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react';
import {Box, Grid, Card, CardActionArea, CardHeader, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography, List, ListItem, Divider, ListItemText, ListItemAvatar, Avatar, TextField, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core' 
import {makeStyles, withStyles} from '@material-ui/core/styles'
import SendIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Send';
import MoreVertIcon from '@material-ui/icons'
import Navbar from '../navbar/navbar'
import Typed  from 'react-typed';
import person1 from './avatar/robbie.png'


const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({
    mainContainer: {
        backgroundColor: '#ecf0f1',
        height: '100%',
        paddingTop: '2rem',
        color: '#34495e'
    },
    headerContainer: {
        textAlign: 'center',
        backgroundColor: '#fa923f',
        color: 'white',
        padding: '0.5rem 0'
    },
    header: {
        fontSize: '2.3rem'
    },
    mainContent: {
        height: '100%',
        marginLeft: '1rem'
    },
    teamContainer: {
        margin: '1rem 2rem'
    },
    inline: {
        display: 'inline'
    },
    mainContainer2: {
        backgroundColor: 'white'
    },
    cardContainer: {
        margin: '3rem auto'
    }
}))
const InputField = withStyles({
    root: {
        '& label.Mui-focused': {
            color: 'tomato',
        },
        '& label': {
            color: 'tan'
        },
        '& .MuiOutlinedInput-root': {
            '& fieldset': {
                borderColor: 'tan'
            },
            '&:hover fieldset': {
                borderColor: 'tan'
            },
            '& .Mui-focused fieldset': {
                borderColor: 'tan'
            }
        },
        

    },
})(TextField);


const Intranet = (props) => {
    const classes = useStyles();
    return (
        <>
            <Navbar/>
                <Box component='header' className={classes.headerContainer}>
                    <Typography className={classes.header}>
                        <Typed strings={['Welcome to the Team Manager!', 'Find out everything to do today!']} typeSpeed={40} backSpeed={60} loop/>
                    </Typography>
                </Box>
            <Box component='div' className={classes.mainContainer}>
                <Box component='div'>
                    <Grid container className={classes.mainContent}>
                        <Grid lg={5} className={classes.teamContainer}>
                            <Typography variant='h5'>Team 1 Updates</Typography>
                            <List className={classes.teamList}>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                            </List>
                            <Box component='form' className={classes.form}>
                                {/* This is the same inputs on each updates section */}
                                <InputField label='Name' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <InputField label='Current Role' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <InputField label='Progress' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <Button className={classes.button} variant='outlined' fullWidth={true} endIcon={<SendIcon/>}>Send</Button>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                        <Grid item lg={5} className={classes.teamContainer}>
                            <Typography variant='h5'>Team 2 Updates</Typography>
                            <List className={classes.teamList}>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                                <ListItem alignItems='flex-start'>
                                    <ListItemAvatar>
                                        <Avatar alt='person1' src={person1}/>
                                    </ListItemAvatar>
                                    <ListItemText
                                        primary='Web Developer'
                                        secondary= {
                                            <React.Fragment>
                                                <Typography component='span' variant='body2' className='classes.inline' color='textPrimary'>
                                                    Alton Ong
                                                </Typography>
                                                {" - Currently working on new interface of the app"}
                                            </React.Fragment>
                                        }
                                    />
                                </ListItem>
                            </List>
                            <Box component='form' className={classes.form}>
                                {/* This is the same inputs on each updates section */}
                                <InputField label='Name' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <InputField label='Current Role' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <InputField label='Progress' fullWidth={true} variant='outlined' margin='dense' size='medium' inputProps={{style: {color: 'white'}}}/>
                                <Button className={classes.button} variant='outlined' fullWidth={true} endIcon={<SendIcon/>}>Send</Button>
                            </Box>
                        </Grid>
                    </Grid>
                </Box>
                
            </Box>
            <Box component='div' className={classes.mainContainer}>
                <Grid container justify='center' >
                    <Grid item lg={5}>
                        <Card className={classes.cardContainer}>
                            <CardHeader title='Team 1 Attendence' subheader='21st Aug 2020' action={<IconButton aria-label='settings'><MoreVertIcon/></IconButton>}/>                       
                        </Card>
                    </Grid>
                    <Grid item lg={5}>
                        <Card className={classes.cardContainer}>

                                        
                        </Card>
                    </Grid>
                </Grid>
                
                                        
            </Box>
        </>
    )
}

export default Intranet
